mapper.insert: insert into review (r_no, p_no, m_email, r_title, r_star, r_content, r_img, r_writedate, r_hit, r_delstatus, o_no) values (review_seq.nextval, #{p_no}, #{m_email}, #{r_title}, #{r_star}, #{r_content}, #{r_img, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, sysdate, 0, 'N', #{o_no} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where m_email = #{m_email} and r_delstatus = 'N'

select R.r_no as r_no, R.p_no as p_no, R.m_email as m_email, R.r_title as r_title, R.r_star as r_star, R.r_content as content, R.r_img as r_img, R.r_writedate as r_writedate, R.r_hit as r_hit, R.r_delstatus as r_delstatus, R.o_no as o_no, OT.o_date as o_date
from review R left join order_tab OT on R.o_no = OT.o_no
where R.m_email = #{m_email} and R.r_delstatus = 'N' order by R.r_writedate desc
mapper.update: update review set r_hit = r_hit + 1 where r_no = #{r_no}
update review set r_delstatus = 'Y' where r_no = #{r_no}
mapper.select: select * from review where m_email = #{m_email} and p_no = #{p_no} and o_no = #{o_no} and r_delstatus = 'N'
select count(*) from review where p_no = #{p_no}
select * from review where p_no = #{p_no} and r_delstatus = 'N' order by r_writedate desc
